name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy - Turnabout Tunes / 逆転裁判123 成歩堂セレクション - 逆転裁判 メモリアルセレクション
detailed_description:
A must-have for any Ace Attorney fan, this 24-track compilation features 14 in-game tracks, 8 orchestral, piano, and jazz arrangements, and sees the debut of 2 new vocal tracks: "Turnabout Sisters - Seaside Swing" and "Eternal Victory - Endings and Beginnings".

The 73+ minute soundtrack has been re-authored from the original, high quality source material. Includes three high quality formats: MP3 (V0 bitrate), 16-bit FLAC and AAC. (Download size: 162MB for MP3, 448MB for FLAC and 204MB for AAC)

Soundtrack files can be found under the game's installation directory below:

\\Steam\steamapps\common\Phoenix Wright Ace Attorney Trilogy\Turnabout Tunes

©CAPCOM CO., LTD.

-Tracklist-


Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney originally composed by Masakazu Sugimori and arranged by Akemi Kimura

Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Case 5 and Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Justice for All composed by Akemi Kimura

Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Trials & Tribulations composed by Noriyuki Iwadare

Additional arrangements by Tomomichi Takeoka, Kaori Komura, Noriyuki Iwadare, Yasumasa Kitagawa

Additional vocal performances by Aimi Mizunami, Zhenlan Kang

Additional piano performances by Takuya Uchikado

Additional jazz performances by Metamorphosis Jazz Band

Additional lyrics by Janet Hsu, Shu Takumi

01 - Phoenix Wright - Objection! 2001 - 1:14 - Masakazu Sugimori, Akemi Kimura
02 - Maya Fey - Turnabout Sisters 2001 - 2:42 - Masakazu Sugimori, Akemi Kimura
03 - Dick Gumshoe - That's "Detective Gumshoe," Pal! - 2:03 - Masakazu Sugimori, Akemi Kimura
04 - Ema Skye - Turnabout Sisters 2005 - 1:50 - Akemi Kimura
05 - Pursuit - Corner the Culprit - 1:38 - Masakazu Sugimori, Akemi Kimura
06 - The Blue Badger - I Want to Protect You - 1:22 - Akemi Kimura
07 - Victory! - Our First Win - 1:54 - Masakazu Sugimori, Akemi Kimura
08 - Pearl Fey - With Pearly - 1:12 - Akemi Kimura
09 - Triumphant Return - Miles Edgeworth - 1:29 - Akemi Kimura
10 - Victory! - Another Win - 2:06 - Akemi Kimura
11 - Larry Butz - When Something Smells, It's Usually Me - 2:00 - Noriyuki Iwadare
12 - Pursuit - Catch the Culprit - 2:01 - Noriyuki Iwadare
13 - Victory! - An Eternal Win - 2:39 - Noriyuki Iwadare
14 - Trials and Tribulations - Ending - 3:39 - Noriyuki Iwadare
15 - The Steel Samurai: Warrior of Neo Olde Tokyo (Orchestral) - 3:46 - Kaori Komuro
16 - Those of Fey Blood (Orchestral) - 4:51 - Kaori Komuro
17 - Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Courtroom Suite (Orchestral) - 5:45 - Noriyuki Iwadare
18 - Berry Big Circus (Piano) - 2:21 - Takuya Uchikado, Tomomichi Takeoka
19 - Maya Fey - Turnabout Sisters 2001 (Piano) - 2:48 - Takuya Uchikado, Tomomichi Takeoka
20 - Trials and Tribulations - Court Begins on a Blue Note Scale (Jazz) - 4:48 - Metamorphosis Jazz Band, Noriyuki Iwadare
21 - Godot - The Fragrance of Darkness; That is Coffee (Jazz) - 5:54 - Metamorphosis Jazz Band, Noriyuki Iwadare
22 - Rise from the Ashes - Ending (Jazz) - 5:25 - Metamorphosis Jazz Band, Noriyuki Iwadare
23 - Turnabout Sisters - Seaside Swing (Vocal) - 3:55 - Aimi Mizunami, Zhenlan Kang, Yasumasa Kitagawa
24 - Eternal Victory - Endings and Beginnings (Vocal) - 5:49 - Aimi Mizunami, Yasumasa Kitagawa

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4160
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1.8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *Recommended Controller Xbox 360 Controller (Windows®7/8.1) Xbox One Wireless Controller (Windows®10)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3570
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660　
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1.8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *Recommended Controller Xbox 360 Controller (Windows®7/8.1) Xbox One Wireless Controller (Windows®10)
